<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Represents the attributes of a location, including identification and measurements.","properties":{"location_attribute":{"type":"object","properties":{"location_id":{"type":"string","description":"Unique identifier for the location."},"attribute_name":{"type":"string","description":"The name of the attribute being measured (e.g., 'Temperature')."},"attribute_value":{"type":"string","description":"The value of the attribute (e.g., '25')."},"attribute_unit_of_measure":{"type":"string","description":"The unit of measure for the attribute (e.g., 'Celsius')."},"created_by_id":{"type":"string","description":"ID of the user who created this record."},"updated_by_id":{"type":"string","description":"ID of the user who last updated this record."}},"required":["location_id","attribute_name","attribute_value","attribute_unit_of_measure","created_by_id","updated_by_id"]}},"title":"Update_Location_attribute"}}},"required":true}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
